verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> <S%H8439>were<s%>, Tola, and <S%H6312>Puah<s%>, <S%H3437>Jashub<s%>, and <S%H8110>Shimron<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8439>Tola<s%>; <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>, and <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%>, and <S%H3400>Jeriel<s%>, and <S%H3181>Jahmai<s%>, and <S%H3005>Jibsam<s%>, and <S%H8050>Shemuel<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, to <S%H8439>wit<s%>, of Tola: they were valiant <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>might<s%> in their <S%H8435>generations<s%>; whose <S%H4557>number<s%> was in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>; <S%H3156>Izrahiah<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3156>Izrahiah<s%>; <S%H4317>Michael<s%>, and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, and <S%H3100>Joel<s%>, <S%H3449>Ishiah<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%>: all of them chief <S%H7218>men<s%>.

And with <S%H8435>them<s%>, by their generations, after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, were <S%H1416>bands<s%> of <S%H6635>soldiers<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7235>men<s%>: for they had many <S%H802>wives<s%> and <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And their <S%H251>brothers<s%> among all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> were <S%H1368>valiant<s%> men of <S%H2428>might<s%>, reckoned in all by their <S%H3187>genealogies<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.
The sons of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; <S%H1106>Bela<s%>, and <S%H1071>Becher<s%>, and <S%H3043>Jediael<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%>; <S%H675>Ezbon<s%>, and <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>, and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>, and <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%>, and <S%H5901>Iri<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%>; <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor<s%>; and were reckoned by their <S%H3187>genealogies<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1071>Becher<s%>; <S%H2160>Zemira<s%>, and <S%H3135>Joash<s%>, and <S%H461>Eliezer<s%>, and <S%H454>Elioenai<s%>, and <S%H6018>Omri<s%>, and <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%>, and <S%H29>Abiah<s%>, and <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>, and <S%H5964>Alameth<s%>. All these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1071>Becher<s%>.

And the <S%H3187>number<s%> of <S%H8435>them<s%>, after their genealogy by their generations, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of <S%H3043>Jediael<s%>; <S%H1092>Bilhan<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1092>Bilhan<s%>; <S%H3274>Jeush<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and <S%H164>Ehud<s%>, and <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%>, and <S%H2133>Zethan<s%>, and <S%H8659>Tharshish<s%>, and <S%H300>Ahishahar<s%>.

All these the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3043>Jediael<s%>, by the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, were <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3318>soldiers<s%>, fit to go out for <S%H6635>war<s%> and <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
<S%H8206>Shuppim<s%> <S%H2650>also<s%>, and Huppim, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5893>Ir<s%>, and <S%H2366>Hushim<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H313>Aher<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>; <S%H3185>Jahziel<s%>, and <S%H1476>Guni<s%>, and <S%H3337>Jezer<s%>, and <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; <S%H844>Ashriel<s%>, whom she <S%H3205>bore<s%>: (but his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> the <S%H761>Aramitess<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>:

And <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%> the sister of <S%H2650>Huppim<s%> and <S%H8206>Shuppim<s%>, whose <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maachah<s%>;) and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> was <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%>: and <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> had <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

And <S%H4601>Maachah<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6570>Peresh<s%>; and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> was <S%H8329>Sheresh<s%>; and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H198>Ulam<s%> and <S%H7552>Rakem<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H198>Ulam<s%>; <S%H917>Bedan<s%>. These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.
And his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H4447>Hammoleketh<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H379>Ishod<s%>, and <S%H44>Abiezer<s%>, and <S%H4244>Mahalah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8061>Shemida<s%> <S%H291>were<s%>, Ahian, and <S%H7928>Shechem<s%>, and <S%H3949>Likhi<s%>, and <S%H593>Aniam<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; <S%H7803>Shuthelah<s%>, and <S%H1260>Bered<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8480>Tahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H497>Eladah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8480>Tahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,

And <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7803>Shuthelah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5827>Ezer<s%>, and <S%H496>Elead<s%>, whom the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%> that were <S%H3205>born<s%> in that <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%>, because they came <S%H3381>down<s%> to take <S%H3947>away<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%>.
And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to comfort <S%H5162>him<s%>.

And when he went <S%H935>in<s%> to his <S%H802>wife<s%>, she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>, because it went <S%H7451>evil<s%> with his <S%H1004>house<s%>.
(And his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> was <S%H7609>Sherah<s%>, who <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1032>Beth<s%>–horon the <S%H8481>nether<s%>, and the <S%H5945>upper<s%>, and <S%H242>Uzzen<s%>–sherah.)
And <S%H7506>Rephah<s%> was his <S%H1121>son<s%>, also <S%H7566>Resheph<s%>, and <S%H8520>Telah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8465>Tahan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
<S%H3936>Laadan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H476>Elishama<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
<S%H5126>Non<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3091>Jehoshua<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And their <S%H272>possessions<s%> and <S%H4186>habitations<s%> <S%H1008>were<s%>, Beth–el and the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H4217>there<s%>, and eastward <S%H5295>Naaran<s%>, and <S%H4628>westward<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>, with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H7927>there<s%>; Shechem also and the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H5804>there<s%>, unto Gaza and the towns <S%H1323>there<s%>:

And by the <S%H3027>borders<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H1052>Beth<s%>–shean and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>. In these <S%H3427>lived<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>; <S%H3232>Imnah<s%>, and <S%H3438>Isuah<s%>, and <S%H3440>Ishuai<s%>, and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>, and <S%H8294>Serah<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>; <S%H2268>Heber<s%>, and <S%H4439>Malchiel<s%>, who is the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1269>Birzavith<s%>.
And <S%H2268>Heber<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H3310>Japhlet<s%>, and <S%H7763>Shomer<s%>, and <S%H2369>Hotham<s%>, and <S%H7774>Shua<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3310>Japhlet<s%>; <S%H6457>Pasach<s%>, and <S%H1118>Bimhal<s%>, and <S%H6220>Ashvath<s%>. These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3310>Japhlet<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8106>Shamer<s%>; <S%H277>Ahi<s%>, and <S%H7303>Rohgah<s%>, <S%H3160>Jehubbah<s%>, and <S%H758>Aram<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1987>Helem<s%>; <S%H6690>Zophah<s%>, and <S%H3234>Imna<s%>, and <S%H8028>Shelesh<s%>, and <S%H6000>Amal<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6690>Zophah<s%>; <S%H5477>Suah<s%>, and <S%H2774>Harnepher<s%>, and <S%H7777>Shual<s%>, and <S%H1275>Beri<s%>, and <S%H3236>Imrah<s%>,
<S%H1221>Bezer<s%>, and <S%H1936>Hod<s%>, and <S%H8037>Shamma<s%>, and <S%H8030>Shilshah<s%>, and <S%H3506>Ithran<s%>, and <S%H878>Beera<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3500>Jether<s%>; <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>, and <S%H6462>Pispah<s%>, and <S%H690>Ara<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5925>Ulla<s%>; <S%H733>Arah<s%>, and <S%H2592>Haniel<s%>, and <S%H7525>Rezia<s%>.

All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H1305>choice<s%> and mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%>. And the <S%H4557>number<s%> throughout the <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of them that were apt to the <S%H6635>war<s%> and to <S%H4421>battle<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>.
